description.black-white:
With a hot flame on its forehead, the user
hurls itself at its target. It lowers the
user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
effect.shortEffect: Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
